meanings.sent1: My forefathers came from a distant land.
meanings.sent2: I learned about my forefathers in history class.
meanings.sent3: The family tree was full of interesting forefathers.
meanings.sent4: Their traditions were passed down from forefathers to children.
meanings.sent5: The stories of our forefathers live on in our hearts.

meanings.sent1: The forefathers of this company laid a strong foundation.
meanings.sent2: The new CEO followed the path set by his forefathers.
meanings.sent3: It's funny to think about the forefathers of modern technology.
meanings.sent4: The forefathers of innovation paved the way for progress.
meanings.sent5: We must honor the wisdom of our forefathers in business.

meanings.sent1: The forefathers of this recipe created a delicious dish.
meanings.sent2: The forefathers of this art form were truly talented.
meanings.sent3: It's amusing to imagine the forefathers of social media.
meanings.sent4: The forefathers of this genre revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent5: The creativity of our forefathers continues to inspire us.
